name: GBML
short_description:
This is GBML, GAIPS' own BML (Behavior Modelling Language) interface.
You can use it to load BML files into a serialized BML class, or populate a BML class with your own data and export it into a BML file.

More info on BML:
http://www.mindmakers.org/projects/bml-1-0/wiki/Wiki

(Intelligent Agents and Synthetic Characters Group)
